MVRetirementStep6JSON: {"pageElements":[{"elements":[{"id":"intro","header":"Social Security","description":"Did you know your Social Security benefit amount depends on when you decide to apply? MVRetirementStep9JSON: {"pageElements":[{"elements":[{"id":"intro","header":"Save more","description":"Make sure you are maximizing your savings for retirement"},{"pageElements":[{"backgroundColor":"var(--secondary-colors-voya-teal)","elements":[{"id":"intro","header":"Here are a few ideas","descriptions":["Take advantage of any employer match offered in your plan.","Try to increase your savings to the limits offered within your plan.","Once you turn 50, take advantage of catch up contributions."],"listType":"ordered","textColor":"var(--primary-colors-voya-white)","marginBottom":"0px","listMargin":"0px"}]}]},{"id":"button","label":"Continue","link":"default"}]}]}

LandingAndOverviewContent: "{\"intro\":{\"header\":\"Preparing for retirement\",\"message\":\"It's a good time to think about the next phase of your life. Find out how to get organized and take actionable steps to prepare for retirement.\",\"imgUrl\":\"assets/icon/journeys/In_Company.svg\"},\"overview\":{\"header\":\"Preparing for retirement\",\"message\":\"It's a good time to think about the next phase of your life. Find out how to get organized and take actionable steps to prepare for retirement.\",\"imgUrl\":\"assets/icon/journeys/In_Company.svg\",\"action\":{\"header\":\"Actions today to help you plan for tomorrow\",\"message\":\"Many people can feel overwhelmed as they get closer to retirement. We're here to help you with ${stepCount} actionable steps to consider.\\n\\nYou'll be able to save your responses and visit helpful articles, tools and videos along the way. Letâ€™s start out by getting organized.\\n\\nWe'll walk you through how to set your vision for retirement and understand your finances today and in the future.\",\"buttonLabel\":\"Let's Go!\"},\"summarySteps\":[{\"journeyStepId\":1,\"header\":\"You want to retire at:\",\"elements\":[{\"id\":\"imageWithValue\",\"answerId\":\"retirementAge\"}]},{\"journeyStepId\":5,\"header\":\"Your Retirement Progress\",\"elements\":[{\"id\":\"orangeMoney\"}]},{\"journeyStepId\":2,\"emptySubheader\":\"You currently have not selected any goals. Revisit this journey to select what is important to you.\",\"subheader\":\"Here's what is most important to you:\",\"header\":\"Your Goals\",\"elements\":[{\"id\":\"wordGroupSummary\",\"answerId\":\"wordGroup\"},{\"id\":\"wordGroupOtherSummary\",\"answerId\":\"otherInput\"}]},{\"journeyStepId\":6,\"subheader\":\"Your expected benefits at each age\",\"header\":\"Social Security\",\"elements\":[{\"id\":\"textFieldInputSummary\",\"answerId\":\"early\",\"label\":\"Early Retirement Age 62\"},{\"id\":\"textFieldInputSummary\",\"answerId\":\"full\",\"label\":\"Full Retirement Age\"},{\"id\":\"textFieldInputSummary\",\"answerId\":\"max\",\"label\":\"Maximum Benefit Age 72\"}]},{\"journeyStepId\":10,\"header\":\"Owe Less\",\"elements\":[{\"id\":\"textFieldInputSummary\",\"answerId\":\"prioritizedDebt\",\"label\":\"The debt you have prioritized to pay down first\"},{\"id\":\"textFieldInputSummary\",\"answerId\":\"additionalDebt\",\"label\":\"The committed amount of money you will pay each month on top of the minimum payment for this debt\"}]}]}}",
MVRetirementStep11JSON: {"pageElements":[{"elements":[{"id":"intro","header":"Review your investment strategy and consolidate accounts","descriptions":["If you have multiple retirement savings accounts, there could be webview{benefits to consolidating them}.","Review your investment allocation. You may want to video{diversify and reduce your risk} to minimize the potential for losing a portion of your savings due to market fluctuations."],"videoUrls":["https://cdnapisec.kaltura.com/p/1234081/sp/123408100/embedIframeJs/uiconf_id/48794683/partner_id/1234081?iframeembed=true&playerId=kaltura_player_1642011967&entry_id=1_9sd775pl"],"playerIds":["kaltura_player_1642011967"],"webviewLinks":["https://www.voya.com/article/understanding-your-distribution-options"],"webviewHeaders":["voya.com"]},{"id":"image","imageUrl":"assets/icon/journeys/retirement/Group_873.svg","altText":""},{"id":"button","label":"Continue","link":"default"}]}]}
MVRetirementStep7JSON: {"pageElements":[{"elements":[{"id":"intro","header":"Plan for medical expenses","description":"Healthcare is one of the most expensive components of retirement. \n\nLearn more about how this may impact you; start by watching the video below:"},{"id":"video","videoUrl":"https://cdnapisec.kaltura.com/p/1234081/sp/123408100/embedIframeJs/uiconf_id/48794683/partner_id/1234081?iframeembed=true&playerId=kaltura_player_1642011223&entry_id=1_9to3way0","playerId":"kaltura_player_1642011223","imageUrl":"assets/icon/journeys/retirement/Group_972.png","altText":"Voya video preview - living longer, lifelong care, medicare, long-term care, employer benefits"},{"pageElements":[{"backgroundColor":"var(--secondary-colors-voya-dark-orange)","elements":[{"id":"intro","header":"Quick Tip","description":"Visit webview{medicare.gov} to find out more about your options","webviewHeaders":["medicare.gov"],"webviewLinks":["https://www.medicare.gov"],"linkColor":"var(--primary-colors-voya-white)","textColor":"var(--primary-colors-voya-white)","headerFontSize":"18px","descFontSize":"16px","marginBottom":"0px"}]}]},{"id":"button","label":"Continue","link":"default"}]}]}
MVRetirementStep1JSON: {"pageElements":[{"elements":[{"id":"intro","header":"When do you want to retire?","description":"At what age would you like to retire? You can always change this later as you update the plan."},{"id":"imageWithValue","imageUrl":"assets/icon/journeys/retirement/Group_396.svg"},{"id":"input","answerId":"retirementAge","type":"textField","label":"Retirement Age","ariaLabel":"Retirement Age","default":67,"help":{"label":"Why do we need this info?","description":"The age you plan to retire is just a starting point. This will help understand how much money you'll need in retirement and how much longer you have to save. Also, there are other benefits and considerations that are dependent on your age, such as Social Security and Medicare, so it's important to plan ahead."},"validationRules":{"type":"number","min":1,"max":80,"decimalPlaces":0}},{"id":"button","label":"Continue","link":"default"}]}]}
